message:
بالنسبة للبوست ده: https://www.facebook.com/groups/egyptian.geeks/permalink/1075846682455039/
-
انا قولت رأيي فيه وقولت ان البوست جابلي سرطان والأخ صاحب البوست مسح الكومنت بتاعي مش فاهم ليه. انا مش عايز اعمل حوار يعني، بس هو عادي ان أي حد يمسح كومنت مش عاجبه هنا؟

data.message: إذا كنت علقت بقولك "البوست ده جابلي سرطان" فقط. هذا ليس رأي، هذه شتيمة او عبث في غير محله. ودي موش طريقة لعمل حوار.

حرية رأى إه و زفت إه؟
Excuse my language, cause I too can express myself however the -fuck- I want. See where this is going? It's going nowhere.

First things first, last time I checked I dont think anyone can delete a comment unless it's an admin. Your comment doesn't include anything out of the ordinary, so I highly doubt that an admin deleted your comment.

We rarely resort to such tactics, even some members go as far as insulting some admins and the comments remain in place.

You've likely commented on the OP's original post, not the OP's "shared" post here. Those two have different set of comments. I also commented on the "shared" post here. 

If that's the case, that you commented on the original post, then it's not really related to this group. The OP is entitled to do whatever he wants with his post on his own page/profile. Comments on this group remain in place.

That put aside, since you dont want
"حوار"
Explain to me the purpose of your post? Or did you just want to put "freedom of expression" in a useful sentence?
طيب انا صاحب البوست ومعرفش امسح كونتتات اصلا!
I removed your comment ... It's offensive. Simply put. You could've stated an opinion like "I don't like this post" and it will be OK.

To everyone else. This is now sorted out.
(If you are interested in the current stand please read replies to Admin Ahmed Alfy's comment).

Stay tuned for related announcement once the admins make the policy explicit.å
